snippet: The authorities began the initiative, which drew long lines, both to help those with low incomes and to try to lower inflation on food prices, local news media reported.
abstract: Iranian government has started handing out food packages for millions of its citizens both to help those with low incomes and to try to lower inflation on food.
lead_paragraph: The authorities began the initiative, which drew long lines, both to help those with low incomes and to try to lower inflation on food prices, local news media reported.

headline.main: Iran Giving Food Away to Millions for Relief
headline.print_headline: Iran Giving Food Away to Millions for Relief
